item.title: An IoT Raspberry Pi powered plant monitoring system II
item.description: Monitoring my plant using sensors, relayr’s cloud, resin.io and the Raspberry Pi This is part of my Challenge to make 26 things before 2017 ends. This post is a continuation of the Raspberry Pi powered plant monitoring system post, in which I discussed the project requirements, and briefly showed how to flash the resinOS to a Raspberry Pi and waterproof a soil sensor. Nothing too fancy by then. Now I will show:
